input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Frosted Yukon Spruce Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Stratford Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill European Silver Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Yukon Spruce Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill European Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Bellevue Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Flip Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Flip Tree'
  - Name='Glitzhome 7.5ft Green Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Aspen Estate Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Frosted Fraser Fir Most Realistic,Frosted White Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Aspen Estate Fir Flip Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Red Spruce Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6.5' Vermont Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Color Changing LED Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6-Feet Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights'
  - Name='Puleo International 4.5' Pre-Lit Noble Fir Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5ft Pre-Lit Slim Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Downswept Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural Vancouver Fir Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree with 350 Clear LED Lights and Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit White River Fir Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and different fir species (Fraser Fir vs Douglas Fir) but both are artificial Christmas trees; likely similar use and general construction but species and brand differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to Fraser Fir above but noted as 'Narrow' shape which may differ in silhouette and fullness compared to downswept full bodied tree; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Frosted Yukon Spruce Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different tree species (Yukon Spruce), different brand; likely less similar in branch shape and texture; also frosted foliage implies different visual style and branch treatment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Stratford Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Spruce species with a different silhouette but still artificial Christmas tree with pre-lit features likely; moderately relevant but less so than fir species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill European Silver Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: European Silver Fir is a fir species so closer to reference's Douglas Fir; likely similar materials and construction but different species and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Yukon Spruce Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Yukon Spruce species, different brand; focus on realism but different species and potentially different branch construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Noble Fir species closer to Douglas Fir; same brand and likely similar construction and use; relatively high relevancy despite species difference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill European Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: European Fir species is a fir like the reference; same brand, likely similar intended use but different species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Bellevue Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Spruce species and different silhouette or branch structure likely; moderate relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Spruce species with narrow silhouette, less similar to downswept full bodied Douglas Fir; lower relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim flip tree function noted, brand same but shape and mechanism differ; moderate relevancy due to different form-factor.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fraser Fir species and flip tree style; related brand and pre-lit tree but different shape mechanism; moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 7.5ft Green Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir type and artificial with similar height; slimmer shape likely less consistent with downswept full body; different brand lowers relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Aspen Estate Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir species with estate style; same brand and intended use; reasonably similar in features and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim silhouette and 'most realistic' branding but slimmer than downswept full bodied tree; different tree shape reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Frosted Fraser Fir Most Realistic,Frosted White Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fraser Fir species with frosted white finish, realistic style common; differs in color treatment and frost effect.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Aspen Estate Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir species flip tree style; similar brand and species but different setup mechanism reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Red Spruce Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Red Spruce species, slim shape, different brand attributes reducing relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6.5' Vermont Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Color Changing LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Spruce species with color changing LED lights which differ significantly from clear light pre-lit feature; different brand; lower relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6-Feet Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: General pre-lit artificial tree of similar height; unspecified species and brand different; moderate relevancy due to general product category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 4.5' Pre-Lit Noble Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Noble Fir species and pre-lit construction but smaller size and different brand lower relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5ft Pre-Lit Slim Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Downswept Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same species Douglas Fir and 'downswept' shape specified; longer height and different brand but very similar features and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural Vancouver Fir Natural Look Artificial Christmas Tree with 350 Clear LED Lights and Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Vancouver Fir species similar to Douglas Fir; natural look, clear LEDs, bendable branches similar construction features; different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 6.5' Pre-Lit White River Fir Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir species but 'pencil' implies very slim and narrow shape unlike downswept full bodied tree; different brand and shape.
